original_text: And in the four and twentieth day of the first month, as I was by the side of the great river, which is Hiddekel;
korean_text: 첫째 달 이십사일에 내가 힛데겔이라 하는 큰 강 가에 있었는데

sentences.original_text: And in the four and twentieth day
as I was by the side of the great river
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 큰 강 가에 있을 때
